channel.title: How can I make it so someone cant loggout durring a fight?
channel.description: Ok, Do you know like on how on runescape it tells you you need to wait 10 seconds after a fight before you can log? Well thats what i wanted on my server because you can pk and log out... Which is unfair (will be rewarding a small reward here :P)
